quote.issuer_name: China Dredging Environment Protection Holdings Ltd.
quote.nm: China Dredging Environment Protection Holdings Ltd.
quote.summary: China Dredging Environment Protection Holdings Ltd is an investment holding company primarily engaged in the dredging business. The Company operates its business through four segments. The Capital and Reclamation Dredging Business segment provides capital and reclamation dredging services and related consultation services. The Environmental Protection Dredging and Water Management Business segment provides dredging or water management services or constructions for promoting environmental interests and water quality mainly for inland rivers. The Other Marine Business segment provides marine hoisting, installation, salvaging, vessel chartering and other engineering services. The Property Management Business segment engages in the management and leasing of a shopping mall and factories and the construction of a hotel. The Company conducts its business in the domestic and overseas markets.
